remarks: The law of concretion in terms of substitutions.  Less general than ~ opelopabsb , but having a much shorter proof.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2002.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
opelopabsbALT $p |- ( <. z , w >. e. { <. x , y >. | ph } <-> [ w / y ] [ z / x ] ph ) $.
$d w x y $.
$d x y z $.
